attributes.action: order fuel companys to freeze price at the pumps and the government to reduce fuel duty by 50% immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the driving instructors of the north east want a freeze on fuel at the pumps and 50% reduction in fuel duty to help everyone

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "order fuel companys to freeze price at the pumps and the government to reduce fuel duty by 50% immediately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16627


Prime Minister's Office
